notes.text:
2 ties Geargia
Thanks @Brenduke - Control Expert for the tips, a few notes:
PepeCoolGuns1
1) desert sunlight wasn't needed. Maybe if you have 3 ties it might be worth running but I much preferred the deck when I dropped it
2) Paleozoic Canadia is great. Stops Mask Change, activation effect monsters, hymn / Mar protection etc as well as an attack
Would run an extra maybe in place of powerful / chalice / the last monster
3) it doesn't target, so don't be an idiot like me and forget vs hazy
4) pulse mines should often be used early (even in the draw phase), especially if you go first
Only consideration is cosmic Cyclone etc being able to pick out your other backrow that can't be used esrly
4) GeargiaArsenal is a great way to ditch a monster in the grave for powerful Rebirth
It puts pressure to have 2-3 Mons out by your second turn without ties, and can often force a surrender
